name: Shooty Man and the Glorbs
description:
***IF GAME LOOKS WEIRD FULL SCREEN IT***

You are dropped in a Glorb infested building with only a pistol, but oh no, they cannot be killed! Survive for 1.5 minutes and a helicopter will pick you up and you win.

Wasd or arrow keys to move, mouse to aim and shoot.

Shooting the glorbs will knock them back and stun them, giving you time to run.

Infinite mode is togglable in the options menu.

This is my first ever game, so feedback would be much appreciated!
